    public class Navigation
extends java.lang.Thread
    Navigation class, used to issue movement orders to the robot using X,Y and Theta coordinates

        public void turnTo(double theta,
          boolean returnImmediately)
        Method used to order the robot to turn to a given angle according to the X axis.
        Parameters:
        theta - final angle
        returnImmediately - boolean indicating if the function should return immediately or wait for the rotation to be complete
